channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Photoshop Elements
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Photoshop Elements

item.title: CVE-2021-39825|2024-09-16T16:18:53.971Z -- adobe -- photoshop%20elements
item.description: Photoshop Elements versions 2021 build 19.0 (20210304.m.156367) (and earlier) are affected by an out-of-bounds write vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious TTF file.
